issue.title: [CI][Rust] docker-compose setup should enable caching
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11485](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11485). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Our docker-compose setup is able to cache C++ compilation artifacts accross invocations, see
https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/docker-compose.yml#L58
and
https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/docker-compose.yml#L129

Ideally the same should be doable for Rust as well.
